ModMetaData.name: Big Little Mod Patch
ModMetaData.author: Daria40K
ModMetaData.description:
This patch applys multiable patches to allow furniture from other mods to link with each other.
Mods Patched: - Advanced Electric Stove - AI Uplifting Assistant - Clockwork And Steam - Comigo's Adequate Cooking Expanded - Comigo's Nutrition - [sd] Goodnight (Continued) - Eccentric Tech - Core - Fast regen 1.3 - Glitter Tech - GloomyFurniture - [LTS]Furnishing - Ideology [Official DLC] - Mechalit Core v2 - [sd] medicaddons (unofficial) - Medical IVs - Medical Supplements - Medieval Overhaul - Modern Bed - More Furniture - More Linkables - Rim-Effect: Core - Rim-Effect: Asari and Reapers - Rim-Effect: Extended Cut - RIMkea - RimLife Expansion Furniture - Rimsenal - Core - Rimsenal - Federation Faction Pack - Rimsenal - Feral Faction Pack - Science Never Stops: Ambition of the Cosmic - Sparkling Worlds - Full Mod - StuffedDoll - Tiny Workbenchs (Continued) - UN-Furniture - Vanilla Cooking Expanded - Vanilla Cooking Expanded - Sushi - Vanilla Factions Expanded - Ancients - Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Medical Module - Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Production - Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Spacer Module - Vault-Tec - Handy things for your vault! - WorkBench Support - More Linkable Facilities -
